statements: DELETE FROM genetic_samples_metadata WHERE researcher_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM genetic_samples_metadata WHERE research_topic = 'Genomics' AND researcher_name = 'Jane Doe'
DELETE FROM genetic_samples WHERE patient_id = 101 AND sample_type = 'Blood Sample';
DELETE FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 500 AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM AnalysisResults WHERE researcher_id = 2 AND analysis_type = 'Genomics';
DELETE FROM researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University A';
DELETE FROM researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University XYZ' AND email = 'researcher@example.com';
